site_name: St Josephs College, Lawrence Street, London, NW7 4JX
description: Change of use from former St Joseph's College (C2 use class) to residential comprising of 49no. self contained units.  Demolition of existing D and F wings and single cloister and erection of replacement D and F wings.  Restoration of remaining A, B, C, E wings and chapel.  Retention and refurbishment of 3 agricultural outbuildings.  Demolition of remaining agricultural buildings.  Associated underground and surface car parking and alterations to landscaping.
